mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.sybm sybm, t.symc symc, t.sydz sydz, t.sylx sylx, t.sysxxxid sysxxxid, t.gxdz gxdz, t.gxdzmc gxdzmc, t.xzqh xzqh, t.ssdw ssdw, t.kyzt kyzt, t.sygs sygs, t.gis_x gisX, t.gis_y gisY, t.gis_h gisH, t.lon lon, t.lat lat, t.gsdw gsdw, t.gsdwlxfs gsdwlxfs, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4

t2.uuid xhs_uuid, t2.szxs xhs_szxs, t2.gwylfw xhs_gwylfw, t2.gwxs xhs_gwxs, t2.gwzj xhs_gwzj, t2.gwyllx xhs_gwyllx, t2.jkxs xhs_jkxs, t2.jkkj xhs_jkkj, t2.zdll xhs_zdll, t2.delete_flag xhs_deleteFlag, t2.datasource xhs_datasource, t2.jdh xhs_jdh, TO_CHAR(t2.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xhs_sjc, t2.reserve1 xhs_reserve1, t2.reserve2 xhs_reserve2, t2.reserve3 xhs_reserve3, TO_CHAR(t2.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xhs_reserve4

t2.uuid xfsc_uuid, t2.sybgc xfsc_sybgc, t2.csl xfsc_csl, t2.jsll xfsc_jsll, t2.qszdll xfsc_qszdll, t2.gwxs xfsc_gwxs, t2.tcwz xfsc_tcwz, t2.tsqscls xfsc_tsqscls, t2.bssj xfsc_bssj, t2.delete_flag xfsc_deleteFlag, t2.datasource xfsc_datasource, t2.jdh xfsc_jdh, TO_CHAR(t2.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xfsc_sjc, t2.reserve1 xfsc_reserve1, t2.reserve2 xfsc_reserve2, t2.reserve3 xfsc_reserve3, TO_CHAR(t2.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xfsc_reserve4

t2.uuid xfsh_uuid, t2.gwzj xfsh_gwzj, t2.gwyl xfsh_gwyl, t2.cskgd xfsh_cskgd, t2.zdll xfsh_zdll, t2.delete_flag xfsh_deleteFlag, t2.datasource xfsh_datasource, t2.jdh xfsh_jdh, TO_CHAR(t2.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xfsh_sjc, t2.reserve1 xfsh_reserve1, t2.reserve2 xfsh_reserve2, t2.reserve3 xfsh_reserve3, TO_CHAR(t2.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xfsh_reserve4

t2.uuid trsyqsd_uuid, t2.sybgc trsyqsd_sybgc, t2.tcwz trsyqsd_tcwz, t2.tsqscls trsyqsd_tsqscls, t2.qsxs trsyqsd_qsxs, t2.trsyid trsyqsd_trsyid, t2.delete_flag trsyqsd_deleteFlag, t2.datasource trsyqsd_datasource, t2.jdh trsyqsd_jdh, TO_CHAR(t2.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') trsyqsd_sjc, t2.reserve1 trsyqsd_reserve1, t2.reserve2 trsyqsd_reserve2, t2.reserve3 trsyqsd_reserve3, TO_CHAR(t2.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') trsyqsd_reserve4

t3.uuid trsy_uuid, t3.trsylx trsy_trsylx, t3.ywksq trsy_ywksq, t3.ksqsj trsy_ksqsj, t3.delete_flag trsy_deleteFlag, t3.datasource trsy_datasource, t3.jdh trsy_jdh, TO_CHAR(t3.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') trsy_sjc, t3.reserve1 trsy_reserve1, t3.reserve2 trsy_reserve2, t3.reserve3 trsy_reserve3, TO_CHAR(t3.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') trsy_reserve4, t3.szms trsy_szms, CASE t3.ywqsd WHEN '1' THEN '有' WHEN '0' THEN '无' END trsy_ywqsd, t3.sz trsy_sz
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_XFSY t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , tcode1.code_name sylxmc, tcode2.code_name xzmc FROM YAGL_XFSY t LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL tcode1 ON (t.sylx = tcode1.code_value AND tcode1.codeid='9C617DE8210445AB9AE776686ABAC3B5') LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL tcode2 ON (t.xz = tcode2.code_value AND tcode2.codeid='SYXZ00000064A72BA5AAF5B1F2F4B6D') WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS pkid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_XFSY(uuid,sybh,symc,sydz,sylx,sysxxxid,gxdz,gxdzmc,xzqy,qsxs,kyzt,xz,gis_x,gis_y,gis_h,glid,bd_lon,bd_lat,ssld,jzsj,qysj,blgxd,blgxn,blgxx,blgxb,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{symc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sydz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sylx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sysxxxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gxdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gxdzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xzqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{qsxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{kyzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gisX,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gisY,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gisH,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{glid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bdLon,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{bdLat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{ssld,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{qysj,jdbcType=DATE},#{blgxd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{blgxn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{blgxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{blgxb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_XFSY t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.PKID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_XFSY(uuid,sybh,symc,sydz,sylx,sysxxxid,gxdz,gxdzmc,xzqy,qsxs,kyzt,xz,gis_x,gis_y,gis_h,glid,bd_lon,bd_lat,ssld,jzsj,qysj,blgxd,blgxn,blgxx,blgxb,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} uuid,#{item.sybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sybh,#{item.symc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} symc,#{item.sydz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sydz,#{item.sylx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sylx,#{item.sysxxxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sysxxxid,#{item.gxdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} gxdz,#{item.gxdzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} gxdzmc,#{item.xzqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xzqy,#{item.qsxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} qsxs,#{item.kyzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} kyzt,#{item.xz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xz,#{item.gisX,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gis_x,#{item.gisY,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gis_y,#{item.gisH,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gis_h,#{item.glid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} glid,#{item.bdLon,jdbcType=DOUBLE} bd_lon,#{item.bdLat,jdbcType=DOUBLE} bd_lat,#{item.ssld,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ssld,#{item.jzsj,jdbcType=DATE} jzsj,#{item.qysj,jdbcType=DATE} qysj,#{item.blgxd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} blgxd,#{item.blgxn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} blgxn,#{item.blgxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} blgxx,#{item.blgxb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} blgxb,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uuid = VALUES(uuid), sybh = VALUES(sybh), symc = VALUES(symc), sydz = VALUES(sydz), sylx = VALUES(sylx), sysxxxid = VALUES(sysxxxid), gxdz = VALUES(gxdz), gxdzmc = VALUES(gxdzmc), xzqy = VALUES(xzqy), qsxs = VALUES(qsxs), kyzt = VALUES(kyzt), xz = VALUES(xz), gis_x = VALUES(gis_x), gis_y = VALUES(gis_y), gis_h = VALUES(gis_h), glid = VALUES(glid), bd_lon = VALUES(bd_lon), bd_lat = VALUES(bd_lat), ssld = VALUES(ssld), jzsj = VALUES(jzsj), qysj = VALUES(qysj), blgxd = VALUES(blgxd), blgxn = VALUES(blgxn), blgxx = VALUES(blgxx), blgxb = VALUES(blgxb), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM YAGL_XFSY t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT
FROM YAGL_XFSY t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.uuid = #{uuid}

SELECT tt.*, , c2.code_name sylxmc, c4.code_name kyztmc, c6.code_name xhs_szxsmc, c8.code_name xhs_gwxs, c10.code_name xhs_jkxs, c12.code_name xzqhmc, c14.code_name xhs_gwyllxmc, txfdz.dzjc dzjc FROM (SELECT
FROM YAGL_XFSY t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.uuid = #{uuid})tt LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFSY_XHS t2 ON t2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND tt.sysxxxid = t2.uuid
LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ txfdz ON tt.gxdz = txfdz.dzid AND txfdz.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'SYLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c2.CODEID = c1.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and tt.sylx = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'SYKYZT' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and tt.kyzt = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'XHSSZXS' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t2.szxs = c6.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'GWXS' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c8.CODEID = c7.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t2.gwxs = c8.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c9 on c9.CODETYPE = 'XHSJKXS' And c9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c10 On c10.CODEID = c9.CODEID And c10.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t2.jkxs = c10.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c11 on c11.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c11.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c12 On c11.CODEID = c12.CODEID And c12.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and tt.xzqh = c12.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c13 on c13.CODETYPE = 'GWYLLX' And c13.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c14 On c13.CODEID = c14.CODEID And c14.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t2.gwyllx = c14.CODE_VALUE

SELECT tt.*, , c2.code_name sylxmc, c4.code_name kyztmc, c6.code_name xfsc_gwxsmc, c8.code_name xzqhmc, txfdz.dzjc dzjc FROM (SELECT
FROM YAGL_XFSY t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.uuid = #{uuid})tt LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFSY_XFSC t2 ON tt.sysxxxid = t2.uuid AND t2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ txfdz ON tt.gxdz = txfdz.dzid AND txfdz.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'SYLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c2.CODEID = c1.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and tt.sylx = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'SYKYZT' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and tt.kyzt = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'GWXS' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t2.gwxs = c6.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c8.CODEID = c7.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and tt.xzqh = c8.CODE_VALUE

SELECT tt.*, , c2.code_name sylxmc, c4.code_name kyztmc, c6.code_name xzqhmc, txfdz.dzjc dzjc FROM (SELECT
FROM YAGL_XFSY t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.uuid = #{uuid})tt LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFSY_XFSH t2 ON tt.sysxxxid = t2.uuid AND t2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ txfdz ON tt.gxdz = txfdz.dzid AND txfdz.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'SYLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c2.CODEID = c1.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and tt.sylx = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'SYKYZT' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and tt.kyzt = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and tt.xzqh = c6.CODE_VALUE

SELECT t1.*, t4.*, txfdz.dzjc dzjc, c2.code_name sylxmc, c4.code_name kyztmc, c6.code_name xzqhmc, c8.code_name trsy_ywksqmc, c10.code_name trsy_szmc, c12.code_name trsy_trsylxmc, c14.code_name trsyqsd_qsxsmc FROM (SELECT
FROM YAGL_XFSY t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.uuid = #{uuid})t1 LEFT JOIN (select ,
from YAGL_XFSY_TRSYQSD t2 LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFSY_TRSY t3 ON t2.trsyid = t3.uuid AND t3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' WHERE t2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' )t4 ON t1.sysxxxid = t4.trsyqsd_uuid
LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ txfdz ON t1.gxdz = txfdz.dzid AND txfdz.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'SYLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c2.CODEID = c1.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t1.sylx = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'SYKYZT' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t1.kyzt = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t1.xzqh = c6.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'SYYWKSQ' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c8.CODEID = c7.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t4.trsy_ywksq = c8.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c9 on c9.CODETYPE = 'SYSZ' And c9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c10 On c10.CODEID = c9.CODEID And c10.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t4.trsy_sz = c10.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c11 on c11.CODETYPE = 'TRSYLX' And c11.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c12 On c12.CODEID = c11.CODEID And c12.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t4.trsy_trsylx = c12.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c13 on c13.CODETYPE = 'QSXS' And c13.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c14 On c14.CODEID = c13.CODEID And c14.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t4.trsyqsd_qsxs = c14.CODE_VALUE

SELECT tt.*, c2.code_name sylxmc, c4.code_name kyztmc, c6.code_name sygsmc FROM ( SELECT , txfdz.dzjc dzjc FROM YAGL_XFSY t LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ txfdz ON t.gxdz = txfdz.dzid AND txfdz.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and txfdz.dzbm like concat(#{dzbm},'%')
AND rownum <= 100 ORDER BY t.SYBM )tt
LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 ON (tt.sylx = c2.code_value AND c2.codeid='9C617DE8210445AB9AE776686ABAC3B5' AND c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N')
LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 ON (tt.kyzt = c4.code_value AND c4.codeid='B9B2B370D9D54F6499C31523A1369C4F' AND c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N')
LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 ON (tt.kyzt = c6.code_value AND c6.codeid='6B2210F144AF2372E053B077770A360E' And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N')

SELECT tt.*, c2.code_name sylxmc, c4.code_name kyztmc, c6.code_name sygsmc FROM (SELECT , txfdz.dzjc dzjc FROM YAGL_XFSY t LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFSY_XHS t2 ON t.sysxxxid = t2.uuid AND t2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ txfdz ON t.gxdz = txfdz.dzid AND txfdz.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and txfdz.dzbm like concat(#{dzbm},'%')
AND rownum <= 100 ORDER BY t.SYBM )tt
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'SYLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c2.CODEID = c1.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and tt.sylx = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'SYKYZT' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and tt.kyzt = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'SYGS' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and tt.sygs = c6.CODE_VALUE

SELECT , c2.code_name sylxmc, c4.code_name kyztmc, c6.code_name sygsmc, txfdz.dzjc dzjc FROM YAGL_XFSY t LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFSY_XFSH t2 ON (t.sysxxxid = t2.uuid AND t2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N')
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'SYLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c2.CODEID = c1.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.sylx = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'SYKYZT' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.kyzt = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'SYGS' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.sygs = c6.CODE_VALUE LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ txfdz ON t.gxdz = txfdz.dzid AND txfdz.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and txfdz.dzbm like concat(#{dzbm},'%')
AND rownum <= 100 ORDER BY t.SYBM

SELECT , c2.code_name sylxmc, c4.code_name kyztmc, c6.code_name sygsmc, txfdz.dzjc dzjc FROM YAGL_XFSY t LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFSY_XFSC t2 ON (t.sysxxxid = t2.uuid AND t2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N')
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'SYLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c2.CODEID = c1.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.sylx = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'SYKYZT' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.kyzt = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'SYGS' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.sygs = c6.CODE_VALUE LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ txfdz ON t.gxdz = txfdz.dzid AND txfdz.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and txfdz.dzbm like concat(#{dzbm},'%')
AND rownum <= 100 ORDER BY t.SYBM

SELECT , c2.code_name sylxmc, c4.code_name kyztmc, c6.code_name sygsmc, txfdz.dzjc dzjc FROM YAGL_XFSY t LEFT JOIN (select ,
from YAGL_XFSY_TRSYQSD t2 LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFSY_TRSY t3 ON t2.trsyid = t3.uuid AND t2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'and t3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N')tt ON t.sysxxxid = tt.trsyqsd_uuid
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'SYLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c2.CODEID = c1.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.sylx = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'SYKYZT' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.kyzt = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'SYGS' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.sygs = c6.CODE_VALUE
LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ txfdz ON t.gxdz = txfdz.dzid AND txfdz.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and tt.trsyqsd_tcwz like concat(#{trsyqsd_tcwz},'%')
and tt.trsy_ywksq = #{trsy_ywksq}
and tt.trsy_sz = #{trsy_sz}
and txfdz.dzbm like concat(#{dzbm},'%')
AND rownum <= 100 ORDER BY t.SYBM
